## hpr2148 :: The DSO138 Oscilloscope Kit Part 2

 
In this episode NYbill talks about finishing the DSO138 Oscilloscope kit.


The DSO138 Oscilloscope Kit (part 1)


https://hackerpublicradio.org/eps.php?id=2029



3D printable case:


https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:779159



The kit with pre-soldered SMD parts:


https://tinyurl.com/j7sr9zy



Without pre-soldered parts:


https://tinyurl.com/hxp3bz3



The forums:


https://tinyurl.com/htq3tne



Pics for the episode:
